normal.explanation: normal drivers drive at a safer distance

aggressive.explanation: aggresive drivers tend to drive closer to the vehicle in front
aggressive drivers are more likely to ignore traffic lights
aggressive drivers are more likely to ignore stop signs
aggressive drivers are more likely to ignore other vehicles

aggressive.explanation: aggressive drivers are more likely to overtake
